h1.title: Convert TIFF to PDF Online
h1.description: Free and fast TIFF to PDF converter with professional layout. Supports multiple files and preserves order.

h2.title: Why Convert TIFF to PDF?
h2.description:
• Document Archiving: Convert scanned TIFFs into PDF for long-term storage.
  • Professional Layout: Clean margins and fit-to-page scaling.
  • Multi-File Support: Merge multiple TIFF images into one PDF.
  • Universal Compatibility: PDF opens on all devices with consistent layout.

h2.title: How to Convert TIFF to PDF Online
h2.description:
1. Click Upload TIFF and select your files.
  2. Arrange them in the correct order.
  3. Click Convert to PDF and download your document instantly.

Batch uploads supported with automatic merging into a single PDF.

h2.title: Features of Our TIFF to PDF Converter
h2.description:
• 100% Free, no watermarks
  • High-quality, print-ready output
  • Batch uploads & merging
  • Secure file handling with encryption

faq.question: Is this TIFF to PDF converter free?
faq.answer: Yes, it’s completely free with no watermarks or hidden fees.

faq.question: Can I upload multiple TIFFs?
faq.answer: Yes, you can upload up to 10 TIFF files and merge them into a single PDF.

faq.question: What file size is supported?
faq.answer: Each file can be up to 50MB in size.

faq.question: Will my PDF be print-ready?
faq.answer: Yes, PDFs are optimized with margins and scaling for printing.

faq.question: Are my files secure?
faq.answer: Yes, all files are encrypted during upload, processed securely, and auto-deleted after conversion.

note: Note: Multi-page TIFFs will be split into separate pages in the resulting PDF. Ensure your viewer supports them for best results.
